articles.headline: Automated Seeding for Always On
articles.description: ECX enables automated seeding of your SQL Server AlwaysON availability group by leveraging Storage snapshot technology to minimize the data movement between primary and secondary replica.
articles.benefit: Automatically and efficiently initialize AlwaysOn availability group.

articles.headline: SAP HANA 2.0 support
articles.description: ECX 2.7 introduces CDM support for SAP HANA 2.0 SPS01. Single tenant configuration can now be automatically protected using storage snapshot.
articles.benefit: Protect your latest version of SAP HANA using ECX Copy Data Management

articles.headline: Recovery improvements
articles.description: ECX now enables Instant recovery of SAP HANA database to original location from the UI portal.

articles.headline: MetroCluster support
articles.description: ECX now supports NetApp MetroCluster configurations running ONTAP 9 and above.
articles.benefit: Automatically and efficiently initialize AlwaysOn availability group.

articles.headline: Recovery improvements
articles.description: ECX now provides an option to change GUID of recovered Cache Instance.

articles.headline: Auto cataloging
articles.description: ECX now automatically inventories registered hosts and storage providers.
articles.benefit: Automatically and efficiently initialize AlwaysOn availability group.

articles.headline: Instant Restore option
articles.description: ECX now offers an option to overwrite existing VMDK during Instant Disk restore..

articles.headline: SLA policy enhancements
articles.description: SLA policy schedule intervals can now be specified in minutes. A minimum value of 5 minutes can be specified for an SLA policy interval.

articles.headline: HA configuration support
articles.description: ECX enables automated seeding of your SQL Server AlwaysON availability group by leveraging Storage snapshot technology to minimize the data movement between primary and secondary replica.
articles.benefit: Automatically and efficiently initialize AlwaysOn availability group.

articles.headline: New Reports
articles.description: ECX 2.7 introduces Instant Disk Restore Volumes report. The report lists the volumes that are created as part of IA disk restore..

articles.headline: Reporting Enhancements
articles.description: Enhanced Storage Capacity report to display managed capacity.
